name: Elemental RPG (Working Title)
description:
A turn-based RPG with combat inspired from games such as Paper Mario.

Adventure with Annabelle, a top royal scientist far ahead of her time, and Princess Nikopherous of the Critt kingdom, a playful but serious leader, as they explore and discover the very inner-workings of their natural world.

Featuring a story combining modern-day politics and some technology in a medieval time period with the world largely divided among two allied kingdoms, the Folks and the Critts, as well as a love story between two main characters.

The elemental source-world breach has been ripped open, and the basic elementa and elemental properties are being improperly leaked into the world, resulting in beasts infused with elemental abilities, from new creatures, like Slimes and Rones, to existing animals and even plant life.
